Evaluator¶

class Evaluators.Evaluator¶

Bases: object

A class used to represent a plaintext Evaluator

static evaluate(self, text)¶

Evaluate plaintext by some parameters

Parameters

text (str) – The plaintext

Returns

Score of the plaintext

Return type

int

Raises

NotImplementedError – If the evaluate function not set in the evaluator

Flag evaluator¶

class Evaluators.FlagEvaluator¶

Bases: Evaluators.evaluator.Evaluator

A class used to represent a flag evaluator.

Score based on the occurrences of the flag in the plaintext

Letter analysis evaluator¶

class Evaluators.LetterEvaluator¶

Bases: Evaluators.evaluator.Evaluator

A class used to represent a letter analysis evaluator.

Score based the difference between the English letter’s frequencies and the plaintext letter’s frequencies

Word analysis evaluator¶

class Evaluators.WordEvaluator¶

Bases: Evaluators.evaluator.Evaluator

A class used to represent a letter analysis evaluator.

Score based on checking words in the english words frequencies, implement by www.wordsapi.com
